titles.title: Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.
Mr. Rogers (KY) moved to suspend the rules and pass the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.J. Res. 106.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Received in the Senate, read twice.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 14. Record Vote Number: 11.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/15/2014--Public Law. Amends the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2014 (P.L. 113-46) to extend through January 18, 2014, specified continuing appropriations for FY2014.
